mapper.select: SELECT q.q_num as q_num, q.id as id, m.pw as pw, q.subject as subject, q.content as content, q.regdate as regdate, q.hit as hit FROM qna q, member m WHERE m.id = q.id and q.q_num=#{q_num}
mapper.update: UPDATE qna SET hit=#{hit} WHERE q_num=#{q_num}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM qna_comment WHERE q_num=#{q_num} ORDER BY com_num
